events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I purchased last week as it does not fit and I no longer want to keep it.
The customer reported a refund request related to a product return due to sizing issues.
Assigning the refund case to the returns department to handle the refund process and further communication.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand you want to return the jacket and request a refund.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
My order number is 123456789, and the jacket is brand new with tags still attached and in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund as soon as we receive the returned jacket. I will send you the return label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and for sending the return label. I appreciate your help.
We have received the returned jacket and successfully processed your refund, which should appear on your card within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been successfully issued and no further requests were made, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
